---
title: "add_footnote_adv"
author: "Hao"
date: "1/5/2018"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

mtcars[1:5, 1:5] %>%
  kable("html") %>%
  kable_styling() %>%
  footnote("ccc", c("number 1; ", "number 2. "), c("a 1; ", "a 2."), c("s 1; ", "s 2."),
                   number_title = "special: ", alphabet_title = "abc: ", 
                   footnote_as_chunk = T)
```
